skins.selfIntroduction: I participated in a number of operations as a member of the Royal Navy. And while I was prepared to face my own sinking, I never would have imagined it would come thanks to a shortage of ammunition... Master, I swear to you that such a fatal mistake will absolutely never happen again.
skins.acquisition: Gloucester, light cruiser of the Royal Maids, at your service, Master. It is my honor and my duty to assist you in becoming a most magnificent commander.
skins.login: Punctuality is not a virtue, it is rather a duty. Master, do bear that in mind.
skins.details: If you have the time to gape at working maids, you have the time to do your own work. Master.
skins.secretaryIdle1: More trouble from the Royal Maids today... Belfast, do look after this troop of clumsy louts.
skins.secretaryIdle2: That Fiji is always buying cosmetics, clothes and the like... You must not learn from her, Master. Life is to be lived in moderation.
skins.secretaryIdle3: A maid has a maid's work, the master has the master's. The maids serve the master, while the master serves everyone. This is the way of the world.
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you need something of me? As your maid, Master, I will do what I can to satisfy your requests above and beyond our typical responsibilities.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Take a seat over there. I am going to educate you on the proper way to treat a lady.

skins.shipDescription: Gloucester, light cruiser of the Royal Maids, at your service for the Spring Festival... You say I look displeased? I beg your pardon, it's just... Such holidays are in fact quite busy for the Maids. We have much on our minds. It is none of your concern.
skins.acquisition: Gloucester, light cruiser of the Royal Maids, at your service for the Spring Festival... You say I look displeased? I beg your pardon, it's just... Such holidays are in fact quite busy for the Maids. We have much on our minds. It is none of your concern.
skins.login: Master, how is your work coming along? Let's avoid having you at the office for the holiday.
skins.details: It was a terrible mistake letting Fiji handle this festival costuming... "Spice up this bit and the Commander'll love it," and such. It's all a game to that girl...
skins.secretaryIdle1: The floor is filthy again...? Oh those girls... I told them a thousand times to wipe their dirty shoes before coming inside...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Master, you should find a bit of time to spend with the girls. Don't forget those packets of New Year money.
skins.secretaryIdle3: The Royal Maids are preparing tonight's banquet. As long as Belfast is there, I don't think they will have any issues... Actually, I think I will go take a look after all...
skins.secretaryTouch: Master, it's impolite to stare at a lady, maid or otherwise.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: We'll have to shackle the master until the end of the festival, I'm afraid...
